column4: I would recommend extracting helios in your home folder like -> /home/username/programs/helios <- you can run it from there fine and don't need to worry about permissions
under: System > Preferences > Main Menu is the editor for your menus.

you can add extra repositories with the "add-apt-repository <PPA>" command PPA's are Personal Package Archives.  They are used to get extra software.  Of course this does not apply to Helios you are installing right now.
yup it's not in the repositories - keep doing what your doing now: thats the right way!
